name: Disco Dirtbag
description:
Update October 4:

Fixed a resolution issue for the WebGL build. Added a downloadable Windows build.

Hopefully the resolution works better now!

Disco Dirtbag is a mazey, fightery game made for the MiniJam90 Illusion game jam! Playable with gamepads as well as keyboard. I hope you enjoy it. Feedback appreciated!
